title: Brigitte Bardot | The Girl in the Bikini (1952) | Colorized Movie | Advent...

sources.title: Brigitte Bardot | The Girl in the Bikini (1952) | Colorized Movie | Advent...
sources.description:
Brigitte Bardot's film debut, as a light-house keeper's daughter ... who believes in dressing light !
Gérard Morere, a Parisian student, sets out to find a lost treasure Troilus in the sea after hearing a lecture. He travels to Tangiers and convinces a smuggler named Erick to take him to an island where he meets Manina, the light-keeper's daughter, and his quest for treasure is complicated by his romance with her.

Original title: Manina, la fille sans voiles (1952) AKA: Manina, the Lighthouse-Keeper’s Daughter
Original B&W version https://youtu.be/k4wRtenqrrc
Director & Writer: Willy Rozier
Cast: Brigitte Bardot, Jean-François Calvé, Howard Vernon
Genres : Adventure, Music, Romance
